title: LiteBans 语言文件无法加载
author: 40SiShi
txt_content:
报错如下

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
看上去是你的语言文本的格式有点问题，能上传让我看一下吗

[01:48:08 ERROR]: [LiteBans] [!!] Your configuration might be invalid. It can be checked using: https://yaml-online-parser.appspot.com/
复制代码

replies.author: 40SiShi
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-8 12:37
看上去是你的语言文本的格式有点问题，能上传让我看一下吗
没事了 我已经自行解决完了awa
